SamPy.smnIO.IO.COSHBIO¶

class SamPy.smnIO.IO.COSHBIO(path, output)¶

IO class for COS instrument handbook plotting. Can be used to read FITS image and tabular data as well as ASCII data. As the path of the files is given in the constructor, this is only useful if the data is in same folder... (should be changed?)
